validation_summary.recommendation: Spec validated - ready for scraper generation after API key registration

authentication.evidence: Phase 2 testing showed HTML documentation page returned with meta description stating 'sign up to acquire keys'. All 10 endpoints tested returned identical HTML content (Content-Type: text/html) instead of API data, indicating the fragment identifier (#api=pricing-api) in the URL pointed to documentation rather than actual API endpoints. Authentication is required to access real API endpoints.
authentication.notes: Trust live API testing over documentation claims. The URL tested contains a fragment identifier which caused the web server to return the API documentation portal page. Real API endpoints will require Ocp-Apim-Subscription-Key header for authentication.

access_requirements.authentication: API key required in Ocp-Apim-Subscription-Key header

registration.process: Sign up to acquire API keys

access_requirements.rate_limits: Unknown - not documented in available materials

rationale: REST API with structured JSON/XML responses
Clear endpoint structure with documented parameters
API key authentication via standard header (Ocp-Apim-Subscription-Key)
Well-defined data models for pricing and congestion data
Supports both current and historical data retrieval
Standard HTTP GET methods for data access
key_challenges: API key registration required before any development can begin
Actual API endpoint URLs need to be discovered (documentation portal URL was tested, not real endpoints)
Rate limits are not documented - need to test with real credentials
Date format and parameter validation requirements need to be tested
Error handling strategy needs to be developed based on actual API responses
Pagination handling may be required for historical data endpoints
Response structure needs to be validated with real API calls

discrepancies.api_testing_showed: URL contains fragment identifier (#api=pricing-api) and returns HTML documentation portal instead of API data
discrepancies.resolution: The provided URL is for API documentation, not actual API endpoints. Real API base URL is likely https://api.misoenergy.org (inferred from standard API patterns). Testing with authentication required to confirm actual endpoint URLs.
discrepancies.phase2_finding: All requests returned HTML documentation page (Content-Type: text/html), not API responses

discrepancies.documentation_said: Bearer Token authentication in Authorization header
discrepancies.api_testing_showed: API requires Ocp-Apim-Subscription-Key header (Azure API Management pattern)
discrepancies.resolution: Trust API testing - authentication uses Ocp-Apim-Subscription-Key header which is Azure API Management standard. Phase 1 documentation mentioned Bearer Token, but actual implementation uses subscription key pattern.
discrepancies.phase2_finding: Documentation portal indicates subscription key-based authentication (Ocp-Apim-Subscription-Key header pattern)

next_steps: Register for API key at: https://data-exchange.misoenergy.org/
Obtain actual API base URL and endpoint paths from registration confirmation or developer portal
Test authentication with real credentials to confirm Ocp-Apim-Subscription-Key header usage
Validate actual endpoint URLs with authenticated requests
Test response formats and data structures with sample requests
Determine rate limits and pagination requirements through testing
Feed validated_datasource_spec.json to scraper-generator once authentication is confirmed
Implement retry logic and rate limiting in scraper based on API behavior
